review: I know that Amazon's purpose in life is to get us to buy more content, but with products like this and their ability to add more value to Prime make me a loyal customer.  Very easy set up and use.  The only complaint I have is that I wish it had HDMI pass-thru and that they integrated it more into the TV experience to control my cable box and search the tv guide as well.  With Google abandoning Google TV in favor of Android TV, I'd like to build around the Fire TV ecosystem if I knew more about where they're going with it.

review: I really wanted to like it, but after having it a little over a month it's going into storage. Unfortunately I can't compare it to any other streaming sticks as the only other device I use to stream is a playstation, however the stick compared to the playstation is incredibly slow (obviously). If you have nothing else to stream on I would recommend picking one up as they are cheap, but mine freezes up at least once every other night so there are definitely better (more expensive) options out there.
